description: Description:Take advantage of the lightening speed of USB 3.0 to quickly transfer files up to 5 Gbps! Connect any 2.5'' Serial ATA (SATA) or SATA II Hard Drive to your computer through an available USB 3.0 port on your desktop or laptop. This case is constructed from durable aluminum, ensuring heat dissipation, and protecting your drive from overheating while also providing you with a sleek brushed aluminum design. The Blue trimming adds elegance and style, making it the perfect enclosure to display on your desk. Reverse compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.1, this enclosure is a perfect solution for data transfers or data backup!Features:* Supports Standard Notebook 2.5" SATA and SATA II Hard drives.* Transfer Rates Up to 5 Gbps when connected to a USB 3.0 port.* Transfer Rates Up to 480 Mbps when connected to a USB 2.0 port.* Hot-swappable, plug and play, no drivers needed.* Backwards-Compatible with USB 2.0 or 1.1System requirements:* Available USB 3.0 port on the computer to achieve full 5 Gbps transfer speeds.* Available USB 2.0 port on the computer to achieve full 480 Mbps transfer speeds.* Windows: XP/Vista/7/8 (Both 32-bit & 64-bit versions) MAC: OS X.What's in the box?* Sabrent EC-ALBL Hard Drive Enclosure* USB 3.0 A-Male A-Female Cable* Carrying Case
title: Sabrent Premium Ultra Slim 2.5-Inch SATA to USB 3.0 External Aluminum Hard Drive Enclosure Blue (EC-ALBL)
